comments.author: @Goldshot123
comments.text:
I do not agree. I think everyone should have a comfortable life, we should all aspire to it as a society. The push and competitiveness and uncertainty in nowadays life is throwing many people into situations where they pay too many taxes, havo no time for the family, are too tired to exercise, can't stretch their salaries enough in many cases and fall to a bur out or depression. Also the prescribed drugs nowadays are intensifying this problem.
Soon they will tell us we must work like the asians do, 6 days a week, 14 hours a day, with 2 weeks leave per year. Is that what we want, need or deserve? Of course not.
